projects.title: LLM-Powered Navigation
projects.description: Exploring how large language models can improve robot navigation and path planning through natural language understanding.

projects.title: 3D-Printed Actuators
projects.description: Developing accessible, high-performance actuators using FDM printing and novel mechanical designs.

projects.title: Real-time Perception Stack
projects.description: Building a modular perception system combining vision, lidar, and proprioceptive sensing for robust environment understanding.

projects.title: Hardware-in-the-Loop Simulation
projects.description: Creating simulation environments that bridge physical hardware with virtual testing for faster iteration cycles.

projects.title: Unreal Engine Game Development
projects.description: Developing a top-down game in Unreal Engine, focusing on gameplay mechanics, level design, and player engagement.

projects.title: 3D Product Design Pipeline
projects.description: Building a workflow for designing and producing 3D-printed consumer products like lamps, keychains, and functional accessories.
